TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MapArea extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement implements class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IChartMapArea
Public Class MapArea Inherits ChartNamedElement Implements IChartMapArea
type MapArea = class inherit ChartNamedElement interface IChartMapArea

span.span: Represents a map area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示映射区的客户端图像映射，并对应于一个 HTML\<区域 > 标记。The class represents a map area of a client-side image map, and corresponds to an HTML \ tag. 对象存储在类。The objects are stored in the class. 有以下两种类型的 对象：There are two types of objects: - 映射区域的图表元素时自动创建 — 例如，数据点、 序列、 图例项或条带线对象-具有非空`ToolTip`，`Url`或`MapAreaAttributes`属性; 请注意所需的其他 HTML 元素此外会创建客户端图像映射。Map areas that are automatically created when a chart element—for example, a data point, series, legend item or strip line object—has a non-empty `ToolTip`, `Url` or `MapAreaAttributes` property; note that other HTML elements that are required for a client-side image map are also created. 在这种情况下，维度和映射区的位置自动确定图表元素。In this case, the dimensions and location of a map area are automatically determined by the chart element. 使用根的事件对象修改或删除这些结构在运行时的区域。Use the event of the root object to delete or modify these map areas at run time. - 具有用户定义的形状和坐标的自定义映射区。Custom map areas that have a user-defined shape and coordinates. 使用属性的要在设计时添加这些自定义映射区或运行时对象。Use the property of the object to add these custom map areas at design time or run time. 设置此属性将没有任何效果，如果属性设置为`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. **重要**以创建图像映射使用前面所述对象，的属性对象必须设置为。**Important** To create an image map using the previously described objects, the property of the object must be set to . 可以使用二进制流时创建图像映射，但必须使用另一种方法。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 对于自定义对象，属性确定相应的形状，和属性确定映射区的位置。For custom objects, the property determines the shape, and the property determines the location of the map area. 工具提示、 超链接或属性，例如目标 = _Blank 或 OnClick="javascript:MyJavaScriptFunction()"，可为所有地图区域设置。Tooltips, hyperlinks, or attributes, such as Target=_Blank or OnClick="javascript:MyJavaScriptFunction()", can be set for all map areas. 使用属性来确定映射区是否为自定义对象; 即，它具有用户定义的形状和坐标。Use the property to determine whether a map area is a custom object; that is, whether it has user-defined shape and coordinates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数可用于创建和初始化的新实例类。This constructor can be used to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 但是，轻松地创建自定义对象是使用其中一个重载`Add`或`Insert`方法的类。However, an easier way to create a custom object is to use one of the overloaded `Add` or `Insert` methods of the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的坐标。

span.span: Gets or sets the coordinates of a object.

value.span: 依赖于映射区形状的坐标数组。

span.span: An array of coordinates that is dependent on the shape of the map area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通常用于设置具有用户定义的形状和坐标的自定义地图区对象的坐标。The property is usually used to set the coordinates of a custom map area object that has a user-defined shape and coordinates. 必须指定为自定义映射区的坐标取决于映射区的形状：The coordinates that must be specified for a custom map area depend on the shape of the map area: - 圆形。Circle. 必须提供三个坐标:"x1，y1，r"，其中"x 1，y2"是圆的中心坐标和"r"是圆的半径。Three coordinates must be provided: "x1, y1, r", where "x1, y2" are the coordinates of the center of the circle, and "r" is the radius of the circle. - 矩形。Rectangle. 必须提供四个坐标:"x1，y1，x2，y2"，其中"x1，y1"是"x2，y2"矩形的左上角的坐标是矩形的右下角的坐标。Four coordinates must be provided: "x1, y1, x2, y2", where "x1, y1" are the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the rectangle and "x2, y2" are the coordinates of the lower-right corner of the rectangle. - 多边形。Polygon. X 和 y 两个或多个必须提供对"x1，y1，x2，y2...xn，yn"，其中每个"x，y"对包含多边形的一个顶点坐标。Two or more x and y pairs must be provided "x1, y1, x2, y2...xn, yn", where each "x, y" pair contains the coordinates of one vertex of the polygon. 在设置坐标时，使用相对坐标系统的图表，其中的图表图像的左上角是"0，0"，图像的右下角是"，100100"。When setting coordinates, use the relative coordinate system of the chart, where the top-left corner of the chart image is "0,0" and the bottom-right corner of the image is "100,100". 定义映射区的形状和坐标之后，和/或属性可用于指定特定的用户交互。After the shape and coordinates are defined for the map area, the , and/or properties can be used to specify a particular user interaction. 请注意以下事项：Note the following: - 仅会在运行时创建一个客户端图像映射根的属性对象是`true`，这是默认设置。A client-side image map will only be created at run time if the property of the root object is `true`, which is the default. - 若要通过添加创建图像映射映射区集合，对象的属性对象必须设置为。To create an image map by adding a object to the map areas collection, the property of the object must be set to . 可以使用二进制流时创建图像映射，但必须使用特殊技术。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but a special technique must be used.

summary.span: 获取或设置映射区的特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the attributes of the map area.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示对应于特定图表元素的映射区的特性。

span.span: A value that represents the attributes of the map area that corresponds to a particular chart element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置此属性，将自动创建一个客户端图像映射，并且将使用创建映射区的特性字符串追加到\<映射 > 对应的标记此属性设置为的对象。If you set this property, a client-side image map will be automatically created, and a map area will be created with the attribute string appended to the \ tag that corresponds to the object that this property is being set for. 例如，设置目标属性使用此属性，并设置`Url`的第一个数据点的属性将导致类似于以下的 HTML 代码：For example, setting the Target attribute using this property and setting the `Url` property of the first data point will result in HTML code that is similar to the following: \...\<映射名称 ="Chart1ImageMap">\<区域形状 ="rect"HREF ="http://www.SomeDomain.ca"COORDS"69,120,106,309"target\=_Blank >\\...\\\ 因为整个字符串追加到\<映射 > 标记，应使用空格分隔多个属性。Because the entire string is appended to the \ tag, multiple attributes should be separated with a space. 属性可以结合使用属性来指定映射区特性，如目标 = _Blank，以及客户端事件处理程序，例如 OnClick="MyEvent()"。The property can be used in conjunction with the property to specify map area attributes such as Target= _Blank, as well as client-side event handlers such as OnClick="MyEvent()". 设置此属性将没有任何效果，如果属性设置为`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. **重要**若要以这种方式，创建图像映射的属性对象必须设置为。**Important** To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 可以使用二进制流时创建图像映射，但必须使用另一种方法。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 当设置此属性时，可以使用特殊关键字。Special keywords can be used when you set this property. 每个关键字将替换为某种类型的适用图表元素中的数据。Each keyword will be replaced with some type of data from the applicable chart element. 请参阅下表获取所有可用关键字的列表：Refer to the following table for a list of all available keywords: |关键字Keyword|替换为Replaced by| |-------------|-----------------| |#VALX#VALX|数据点的 X 值。X-value of the data point.| |#VAL，#VALY，#VALY2，#VALY3...#VAL, #VALY, #VALY2, #VALY3…|数据点的 Y 值。Y-values of the data point.| |#SER#SER|序列名称。Series name.| |#LABEL#LABEL|数据点标签。Data point label.| |#INDEX#INDEX|数据点索引。Data point index.| |#PERCENT#PERCENT|百分比的数据点的 Y 值。Percentage of the data point Y-value.| |#TOTAL#TOTAL|序列中所有 Y 值的总计。Total of all Y-values in the series.| |#LEGENDTEXT#LEGENDTEXT|图例文本。Legend text.| 若要创建具有用户定义的坐标的图像映射，请使用根的属性对象。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值决定了映射区对象的形状。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the shape of a map area object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性通常用于设置自定义地图区对象，它具有用户定义的形状和坐标的形状。This property is usually used to set the shape of a custom map area object, which has a user-defined shape and coordinates. 自定义地图区的形状确定的则必须指定坐标的类型和可用形状为圆形、 矩形和多边形。The shape of the custom map area determines the type of coordinates that must be specified, and available shapes are circles, rectangles and polygons. 检索的形状时中存储的对象，不是一个矩形或圆任何形状将被视为是多边形。When retrieving the shapes of objects that are stored in the , any shape that is not a rectangle or a circle will be considered a polygon. 例如，自定义映射区可以添加到映射区集合使用对象作为参数，它允许任何要使用的形状类型。For example, a custom map area can be added to the map areas collection using a object as a parameter, which allows any type of shape to be used. 如果属性的此特定检索对象，它将返回。If the property of this particular object is retrieved, it will return a . 定义形状和坐标的地图区域后， ，和/或属性可用于指定特定的用户交互。After the shape and coordinates of a map area are defined, the , and/or properties can be used to specify a particular user interaction. 请注意以下事项：Note the following: - 如果根图表对象的 IsMapEnabled 属性为 true，这是默认值，则仅将在运行时创建客户端图像映射。A client-side image map will only be created at run-time if the IsMapEnabled property of the root Chart object is true, which is the default. - 若要创建映像通过将是 MapArea 对象添加到映射区集合图表对象的 RenderType 属性的映射必须 RenderType.ImageTag。To create an image map by adding a MapArea object to the map areas collection the RenderType property of the Chart object MUST be RenderType.ImageTag. 可以使用二进制流时创建图像映射，但必须使用特殊技术。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but a special technique must be used.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ToolTip { get; set; }
.property instance string ToolTip
Public Property ToolTip As String
public: property System::String ^ ToolTip { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ToolTip : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置映射区的工具提示。

span.span: Gets or sets the tooltip for the map area.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图表元素的工具提示。

span.span: A value that represents the tooltip of the chart element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性将会自动导致客户端图像映射正在创建，并将使用 Title 属性设置为指定的工具提示字符串创建映射区。Setting this property will automatically result in a client-side image map being created, and a map area will be created with the Title attribute set to the specified tooltip string. 映射区将使用对应于相关的图表元素的尺寸。The map area will use the dimensions that correspond to the relevant chart element. 例如，如果属性设置为数据点，则将在运行时生成 HTML 代码类似于以下代码：For example, if the property is set for a data point, then HTML code similar to the following code will be generated at run time: \<映射名称 ="Chart1ImageMap">\<区域形状 ="rect"Title ="第一个数据值 = 19"COORDS"69,120,106,309"= >\\\\ 设置此属性将没有任何效果，如果属性设置为`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. **重要**若要以这种方式，创建图像映射的属性对象必须设置为。**Important** To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 可以使用二进制流时创建图像映射，但必须使用另一种方法。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 此属性可以设置特殊关键字，以显示不同类型的与图表相关的数据。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 若要创建具有用户定义的坐标的图像映射，请使用根的属性对象。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Url { get; set; }
.property instance string Url
Public Property Url As String
public: property System::String ^ Url { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Url : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.UrlValueEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")
get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置映射区的目标 URL 或定位点。

span.span: Gets or sets the destination URL or anchor point of the map area.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值表示映射区的目标 URL 或定位点。

span.span: A value that represents the destination URL or anchor point of the map area.

value.span: 若要使用绝对 URL，请以“http://”或“www.”开始字符串表达式。

span.span: To use an absolute URL, start the string expression with either "http://" or "www.".

value.span: 如果字符串不是以上述前缀之一开始，则会被视为相对 URL。

span.span: If the string does not start with either of these prefixes, it will be treated as a relative URL.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当设置此属性时，将自动创建一个客户端图像映射，并将具有 HREF 特性设置为指定的定位点或 URL 创建一个映射区域。When you set this property, a client-side image map will automatically be created, and a map area will be created with the HREF attribute set to the specified anchor or URL. 此映射区也将使用对应于相关的图表元素的尺寸。This map area will also use the dimensions that correspond to the relevant chart element. 例如，如果 HREF 属性设置为数据点，然后类似如下的 HTML 代码将生成在运行时：For example, if the HREF property is set for a data point, then HTML code similar to the following will be generated at run time: <i m g id ="Chart1"USEMAP ="#Chart1ImageMap"src ="ChartPic_000002.jpg？ 6735e83b-f0cd-4225-8be4-047695a61040"border ="0"/>\...\<映射名称 ="Chart1ImageMap">\<区域形状 ="rect"HREF ="http://www.healthquotes.ca"COORDS ="69,120,106,309">\</Typedef/ 映射><img id="Chart1" USEMAP="#Chart1ImageMap" src="ChartPic_000002.jpg?6735e83b-f0cd-4225-8be4-047695a61040" border="0" />\
...\
<MAP NAME="Chart1ImageMap">\
<AREA SHAPE="rect" HREF="http://www.healthquotes.ca" COORDS= "69,120,106,309">\
</MAP> 设置此属性将没有任何效果，如果属性设置为`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. **重要**若要以这种方式，创建图像映射的属性对象必须设置为。**Important** To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 可以使用二进制流时创建图像映射，但必须使用另一种方法。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 可以通过使用指定特性的映射区域，如目标 = 空属性。Attributes of the map area(s), such as TARGET=-Blank, can be specified by using the property. 此属性可以设置特殊关键字，以显示不同类型的与图表相关的数据。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 若要创建具有用户定义的坐标的图像映射，请使用根的属性对象。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object.
